intro: The crowd is looking at you full of expectation...

effects.pos: The crowd warms to you and doesnt looks less threatening to you
effects.neg: You hear muffled shouting in the background. This doesnt seem to be good ...

intro: You see mixed feelings on the faces of the crowd. Some seem to praise you some are more skeptical ...

selection.text: Use your lighter to ignite a build?
Grab the golden mask from the altar

effects.fail: You return empty handed to your time
effects.win: You grab the mask, turn on your timemachine and return as a will-be-rich man
